reviewText: This is not a region 1 dvd. VERY DISAPPOINTED. I was looking forward to watching this with my kids. They are huge fans and it was not fun seeing them upset because of it not working.
I'm very disappointed that this collection is not formatted for North America.  Had they stated this in the description section, I would not have wasted my money on this set.

I love the whole collection but I did not know when I ordered it that it only plays in regional 2 DVD players, so they won't play in mine and I the out the invoice before I realized all of this. So I don't have what I wanted n I'm very disappointed
This is formated for the UK, not US!  YOU SHOULD LET BUYERS KNOW THAT BEFORE YOU SEND IT TO THE US!!!!!

The region for this set is 0 (world wide); HOWEVER it is formatted for PAL systems, and it will NOT play on NSTC players. Seller should have disclosed region AND format...very deceiving..... will try to return to Amazon.
